foreign_key.foreign_key_sql: foreign key (addressid) references address (id) on delete restrict on update restrict
foreign key (articleid) references articles (id) on delete restrict on update restrict
foreign key (addressnumber) references address (id) on delete restrict on update restrict

function.description: if insert new goods, actual the stock, old = f_upd := '' select case when (select actual_stock from '' || TG_RELNAME || '' where id = (select max(id) from '' || TG_RELNAME || '' where stock_id = '' || NEW.stock_id || '' and article_id = '' || NEW.article_id ||'' )) is NULL then 0 END + ''|| NEW.to_embed - NEW.roll_out || '' into v_actual_stock from '' || TG_RELNAME || '' where id = '' || NEW.id ;

trigger.description: update or insert set sep_info_3 to 5
if delete a PARTNER_SCHEDUL, set status to delete
if delete a address, check for use in order, then delete all CUON_CLIENTS
if delete a article, check for use in order, then delete all CUON_CLIENTS
if delete a CUON_CLIENTS, set status to delete
if delete a STAFF, set status to delete
if delete a PROJECTS, set status to delete
if delete a PROJECT_TASKS, set status to delete
if delete a PROJECT_TASK_STAFF_RES, set status to delete
if delete a PROJECT_TASK_MATERIAL_RES, set status to delete
if delete a PROJECT_PHASES, set status to delete
if delete a ORDERBOOK, set status to delete
if delete a DMS, set status to delete
if delete a CLIENTS, set status to delete
if delete a BIBLIO, set status to delete
if delete a support_project, set status to delete
if delete a support_ticket, set status to delete
if delete a invoice, check for use in order, then delete the invoice
if delete a BOTANY, set status to delete
if delete a HIBERNATION_PLANT, set status to delete
if delete a HIBERNATION, set status to delete
if delete a graveyard, set status to delete
if delete a grave, set status to delete
if delete a grave_work_autumn, set status to delete
if delete a grave_work_summer, set status to delete
if delete a grave_work_spring, set status to delete
if delete a grave_work_winter, set status to delete
if delete a grave_work_single, set status to delete
if delete a grave_work_year, set status to delete
if delete a grave_work_holiday, set status to delete
if delete a grave_work_maintenance, set status to delete
if delete a grave_service_notes, set status to delete
